description:
'''Camillo''' "'''Chino'''" '''Wong Moreno''' (born June 20, 1973) is an American musician who is best known as the lead vocalist and primary lyricist of the [[alternative metal]] band [[Deftones]]. He is also a member of the side-project groups [[Team Sleep]], [[Crosses (band)|Crosses]], and [[Palms (band)|Palms]].

Moreno is known for his [[dramatic tenor]] voice and distinctive [[Screaming (music)|screams]]. In 2007, he was placed at number 51 in ''[[Hit Parader]]''{{'}}s "Top 100 Metal Vocalists of All Time".
